name: tubesync
description: Tubesync is a self-hosted tool that syncs YouTube channels and playlists to media servers like Jellyfin, downloading and organizing videos automatically with minimal configuration.
features: Channel synchronization: Automatically sync YouTube channels to your media server library.
Playlist support: Download entire playlists and keep them updated as new videos are added.
Media server integration: Organize downloads for seamless integration with Jellyfin, Plex, or Emby.
Automatic downloads: Download new videos automatically as channels publish them.
Quality selection: Choose preferred video quality and format for downloads.
Metadata management: Fetch and organize video metadata for proper media server cataloging.
Scheduling: Configure download schedules to run during off-peak hours or specific times.
Filtering rules: Set rules to download only specific videos based on title, duration, or upload date.
Storage management: Monitor storage usage and set limits to prevent disk space issues.
Web interface: Configure and monitor synchronization through a straightforward web interface.
Minimal configuration: Get started quickly with sensible defaults and simple setup process.
Background operation: Run continuously in the background with minimal resource usage.
